collection.review: The book was extremely heart wrenching and super well written. Really loved the way Colleen Hoover described the situations as though they were real.

This book really had me at the edge of my seat and had quite the twists and turns that really kept me wanting to read it. I genuinely loved this book and loved the creepiness it felt. Totally unexpected ending as well.

Oh my goodness this book had me clutching it until the end. The twist in the middle of the book had me so sad and yearning for everyone to just be together happily in the end. There was not too much romance, but just enough. I was hooked. Also a heart wrenching book and I cannot wait to see what happens in the second book since it ends in a cliffhanger!
Will update my review once I have read it!
